TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BindingMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 描述繫結的資料流程方向。

span.span: Describes the direction of the data flow in a binding.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Data.BindingMode Default = int32(4)

summary.span: 使用繫結目標的預設 值。

span.span: Uses the default value of the binding target.

summary.span: 每個相依性屬性的預設值都不同。

span.span: The default value varies for each dependency property.

summary.span: 一般而言，使用者可編輯的控制項屬性 (例如文字方塊和核取方塊的控制項屬性) 預設為雙向繫結，而其他大多數屬性則預設為單向繫結。

span.span: In general, user-editable control properties, such as those of text boxes and check boxes, default to two-way bindings, whereas most other properties default to one-way bindings.

summary.span: 判斷相依性屬性預設是否會單向或雙向繫結的程式設計方式是，使用 取得屬性的屬性中繼資料，然後檢查 屬性的布林值。

span.span: A programmatic way to determine whether a dependency property binds one-way or two-way by default is to get the property metadata of the property using and then check the Boolean value of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Data.BindingMode OneTime = int32(2)

summary.span: 當應用程式啟動或資料內容變更時，更新繫結目標。

span.span: Updates the binding target when the application starts or when the data context changes.

summary.span: 如果您使用的資料適合使用目前狀態的快照集或資料是真正的靜態，則此類型的繫結很適當。

span.span: This type of binding is appropriate if you are using data where either a snapshot of the current state is appropriate to use or the data is truly static.

summary.span: 如果您想要以來源屬性的某些值初始化目標屬性，但無法預先得知資料內容，則此類型的繫結也很有用。

span.span: This type of binding is also useful if you want to initialize your target property with some value from a source property and the data context is not known in advance.

summary.span: 基本上這是 繫結的簡單形式，而這在來源值沒有變更的情況下可以提供更好的效能。

span.span: This is essentially a simpler form of binding that provides better performance in cases where the source value does not change.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Data.BindingMode OneWay = int32(1)

summary.span: 當繫結來源 (來源) 變更時，更新繫結目標 (目標) 屬性。

span.span: Updates the binding target (target) property when the binding source (source) changes.

summary.span: 如果要繫結的控制項是隱含唯讀的，這種類型的繫結很適當。

span.span: This type of binding is appropriate if the control being bound is implicitly read-only.

summary.span: 例如，您可以繫結至來源，例如股票行情指示器。

span.span: For instance, you may bind to a source such as a stock ticker.

summary.span: 或者目標屬性沒有可供進行變更的控制項介面，例如資料表的資料繫結背景色彩。

span.span: Or perhaps your target property has no control interface provided for making changes, such as a data-bound background color of a table.

summary.span: 如果沒有需要監視目標屬性的變更，則使用 繫結模式可以避免 繫結模式所帶來的負荷。

span.span: If there is no need to monitor the changes of the target property, using the binding mode avoids the overhead of the binding mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Data.BindingMode OneWayToSource = int32(3)

summary.span: 當目標屬性變更時，更新來源屬性。

span.span: Updates the source property when the target property changes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Data.BindingMode TwoWay = int32(0)

summary.span: 造成來源屬性或目標屬性變更為自動更新對方。

span.span: Causes changes to either the source property or the target property to automatically update the other.

summary.span: 這種類型的繫結適合可編輯表單或其他完全互動式的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 案例。

span.span: This type of binding is appropriate for editable forms or other fully-interactive [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] scenarios.
